entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
